Reviews.Title: “We got what we paid for”
Reviews.Author: OPM33136
Reviews.Content: We got exactly what we paid for. Night front desk person was extremely rude. Day Manager did not want to believe that her employee could be so unprofessional. Parking was terrible. Had to ask that bed linen be changed. Would never stay here again. No restaurant or fitness center.

Reviews.Title: “Staff is wonderful”
Reviews.Author: Ken J
Reviews.Content: Hotel is clean,well appointed and well managed. I travel for half of every month as part of my job and run into all kinds of hotel staff. These folks try hard and work well together. That makes the experience a good one for us. Come on! You won't be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel we have ever stayed in.”
Reviews.Author: Annette C
Reviews.Content: What can I sat, this is by far the best hotel we have ever stayed in. We stumbled on this fantastic hotel this past March during bike week. We were booked to stay at another hotel but upon checking into out room it was the most disgusting place we have ever seen, when you walk into a room that has a 4 legged critter running behind the stove YOU GET OUT. this led us to find Sea shells beach club. Upon us telling them of our experience they very quickly, professionally and compassionately attended our request for a room last minute during bike week, they only had 2 rooms left and gave us a great room with a discount because of what we had just experienced. It made our vacation,(we were ready to go back home) they saved our vacation is what we should say. We have just retuned back from staying there this past weekend and when the manager saw my husband the first thing he said was" I remember you your back, so nice to see you back here" once again we were treated with the best service ever, from having new front dest staff to the housekeeping crew, always with a smile and how are you doing today. I could go on more and more so instead you have to stay at the hotel to see for yourself, the rooms have all been renovated and the pool, the ocean view is spectacular. All we can say is THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR GIVING US THE BEST SERVICE EVER. NEVER HESITATE TO STAY HERE. Annette and Geoff Canada

Reviews.Title: “Completely amazed by this experience!”
Reviews.Author: Robertstone1
Reviews.Content: I don't know where to start. This place is right on the beach, has a nice heated pool, a grill for personal use, toys for the kids... The list could go on and on. We arrived here last Friday, and are staying until next Saturday. The ENTIRE staff is very friendly, and will definitely go out of their way to make sure your stay is everything you want. They provide soaps from Bath and Body Works, make-up removing wipes, and all the plates, silverware, cookware, etc. you could need. This is my first time brining the family to Daytona Beach, and I know where I will be staying everytime I return. The only drawback is parking, it is a little tight, but nothing crazy or over the top. The rooms are extravagant, because it's not a big fancy resort. But they worked perfected for my family of 4. This experience is by far better than I could have imagined. Save some money and skip the chain hotels, this is all you need and more!

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice”
Reviews.Author: gmkendall
Reviews.Content: Within walking distance to everything you need. Staff was awesome. We had beach view. Cozy room with everything you need for a relaxing get away. It is not the most lavish, but if you are looking to save money- for the money it is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: “We love this place”
Reviews.Author: capt B
Reviews.Content: We have been staying at Sea Shells for 3 years now twice a year for Bike week in March and Biketoberfest in Oct , Friendly staff great beach and pool night time security for our Bikes and walking distance to main street , We have a group of us and we have never even looked at another place after staying here , Last trip we had a small prob with our room and Ange moved us to a larger room even though ours was fixed in a short time # 1 Destination for Bike events , Leaving in the morning for 2012 Bike week see ya soon. Capt bob and the starvmax crew

Reviews.Title: “Nice getaway spot”
Reviews.Author: Midwest_Traveler871
Reviews.Content: My husband and I spent a few days in Daytona Beach to have a few days of R & R. We stayed on the 4th floor ocean side and it was absolutely wonderful. They had just finished remodeling our room and it was very nicely done. The hotel is older as is the population in Daytona Beach but they have done a great job of keeping it updated. There was beach access from the courtyard and we spent most of our time walking the coast. There is a bar a few hotels to the north that was a lot of fun. Or you could walk a mile south to the pier. The kitchette is perfect for an extended stay. There is a grocery store just a mile up the road. The taxi cabs are expensive, $40 each way just to go 8 miles. I would definately come back with the entire family to spend more time here but I would stay in the suite. Great place to stay if you are tired of the big hotels where every one in the chain is the same. They took great care to personalize your stay.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent property”
Reviews.Author: Landmyne
Reviews.Content: Sea shells is a small establishment, but it has big ammeneties....the 2 bedroom, 2 bath suite was just right for my family of 4. We were in room 400 which is street side and had a balcony facing the street and another balcony facing the side which gave us a view of the ocean and the street.... it was great for watching the traffic and the ocean. It was equipped with everything we needed to make our vacation affordable. The kitchen could have more baking/cooking supplies, but that is a very minor complaint. Great guest soaps, shampoo, lotion from Bath & Body Works. The pool was very nice & the water was warm. Steps to the beach. Within walking distance to many of the small shops & restaurants. Overall, I preferred staying here to some larger chain hotel because the staff was much less stressed and could give me the kind of service that is expected.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Stay, will be back again”
Reviews.Author: walker_sam
Reviews.Content: The ladies at the front desk who took my reservation were extremely nice and helpful and when we arrived, check in was a breeze. I was very impressed with our room especially for the price. It was very clean and stocked with everything we needed. The toiletries were bath and body shampoo, soap, conditioner, shower gel, and lotion just like a fancy resort. They also had makeup remover pads which was great. The location is great and you can walk right out onto the beach. This hotel offers beach chairs, boogie boards, bicycles and sand toys for free, you just have to sign them out. How cool is that? They also have an activities director onsite that plans activities for both kids and adults. We had intended to go on the wine tasting trip but my son got sick beforehand. Our first day here we spent the morning on the beach then went over to St Augustine and toured around and did a ghost tour. We had a blast. The second day we spent the morning on the beach and then came in for lunch. the resort grilled hot dogs and had a hot dog social with all the trimmings for the guests which was awesome. That evening we went to Ocean Walk and ate ot Bubba Gumps which was great. We spent most of the next day on the beach and in the pool and had a blast. the whole time we were there, anything we needed was taken care of, the staff was really friendly and we could not ask for anyplace to be cleaner. This is a small place but you will not find anywhere that has any more heart and soul to it. I would definately recommend it and will go back.

Reviews.Title: “Clean but very old establishment and needs to be updated”
Reviews.Author: zooweemama
Reviews.Content: They definately clean the place. Our room had such a smell of bleach when we walked in. I was wondering what they were covering up. Friendly reception, but their system is so outdated they have to photo copy your visa and driver's lic. when you arrive. Didn't feel too comfortable with that. A few bugs here and there, but you are in 90 degree weather so it is expected.

Reviews.Title: “The Very Best”
Reviews.Author: MarKarpinski
Reviews.Content: We will never stay anywhere else. The rooms and location are awesome, perfectly clean and you actually feel like your staying at home instead of at a motel. Super pool area and right on a great beach. But, the best thing about Sea Shells are the people who run it. We came to Daytona to attend the Coke Zero 400 NASCAR race and our car broke down at midnight after the race. Angelina, the manager, and the rest of the staff were very supportive and helpful in helping us get through what would have been a very stressful experience otherwise. We had to stay over extra from what we had reserved during one of the busiest weekends of the year and they went out of their way to accommodate us so we could concentrate on getting our car repaired during the 4th of July weekend. When you stay here you feel like the people in the office are your friends, not employees of some faceless corporation. We will return next year for the race and wouldn’t consider staying anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful, great staff, perfect location, excellent rooms!”
Reviews.Author: Barb50827
Reviews.Content: We took our family vacation this week. Total of 15 people. We booked a 2 bdrm unit and two separate 1 bdrm units. The rooms were absolutely perfect - more than enough room, great kitchens, wonderful views from balconies. There outside area had swimming pool and grill in front of the ocean. They brought in a DJ few nights. It was the most fun ever. The staff is soooo courteous and helpful. They accomodated anything the 15 people in our group needed! They let us borrow boogie boards, bikes (no extra charge) and towels galore! We will definitely book our next vacation with them whether it is just my husband & I or the whole family. I cannot express how wonderful they were! And since we were from Ohio, they were helpful with suggestions around the area. Thank you all at Sea Shells Beach Club so much. We loved it! Barb & Tom Mix

Reviews.Title: “Very Happy with accommodations & Service!”
Reviews.Author: BeachgirlCleveland
Reviews.Content: Had a great week, room was very clean, staff was very helpful & the beach was fabulous! We had several rooms reserved for different family members and all were nice and well equipped with supplies. Staff was great whenever we needed anything, They had bikes, beach chairs and body boards free for the asking. While it is an older condo, they have updated everything. Good deal for the price!

Reviews.Title: “Not up to standards”
Reviews.Author: jm2bad
Reviews.Content: Sea Shells is an older establishment south of the pier. We stayed on a timeshare exchange. Everything from the exterior of the building to the convertible sofa in the room looked tired. We stayed in room 402. Our primary view from the balcony was to a dirty, vacant lot. The room smelled musty, and the carpet well worn. The refrigerator lacked adequate seal. Everytime we closed freezer section, the refrigerator door would open and vice versa. Both the refrigerator and air conditioner were loud by modern standards. For its age, the room and kitchen were relatively clean and all appliances worked adequately. The free internet would not connect in our room. Also the elevator broke down twice while we were in it. It was inoperable for the better part of one day of our visit. Not idea when staying on the fourth floor. Parking is limited and tight. The beach is just beyond the pool (clean). Beach towels, chairs, boogie boards, etc are available for check out at the front desk. James, the night manager, was friendly and provided excellent service. I would say the other two women were worthless, but that understates the situation. The pregnant one lied to my face about housekeeping coming to our room and refused to acknowledge her error even when all possible options were presented. Overall, it was adequate for those on a budget who don't plan on spending much time in the room. Generally, I'd recommend either spending a little bit more to be closer to the pier area, preferrable north of SSBC.

Reviews.Title: “"Very nice place to stay"”
Reviews.Author: dfb1950
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a week at Sea Shells. We thoughly enjoyed it. First off, don't expect a Hilton, Hyatt, or 5 Star Resort, this isn't one. It is a nice, clean, friendly resort that is close to many places such as the boardwalk and several nice restaurants. They have toys for your kids to use at the salt water pool or on the beach. They have bikes that you can use to cruise on the beach or around town. Our room faced the ocean, was clean, and spacious. I would like to see them update their TVs and we had a problem with our patio door handle...nothing big. Those are the only two problems I had with Sea Shells. If we return to Daytona Beach, I will stay there again without question.

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't Stay Again”
Reviews.Author: ollie12341
Reviews.Content: Stayed there a few years back, nothing changed, toilet paper holder behind door in a tiny bathroom, same bedspreads, floor was dirty, staff was friendly though, parking difficult, needs exterior paint

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable and didn'y want to leave.”
Reviews.Author: hollysmom319
Reviews.Content: We arrived the evening before our scheduled week. It was Christmas Eve and we were looking for a place to stay. We went to Sea Shells hoping they would have an extra room. y. They gave a us another room for the night for a great deal. The next day, we didn't have to check out, they allowed us to stay in the room until our suite was ready. The suite was clean and spacious. The pool was warm and we had a nice view. The staff was friendly and we can't wait to go back.

Reviews.Title: “Stayed for one Week with Family for Vacation”
Reviews.Author: tennisplayer33158
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel through Global Connections which I am a member. For a Timeshare/Vacation Resort this place is lacking what other high quality timeshare/vacation resorts offer. Based on that, this place in only adequate at best. We had a two bedroom, two bath unit. The condo was clean to the eye, however the carpets were not clean. They were vacuumed but looked like they needed a good shampoo. The kitchen was small. We had a problem with many things breaking. The t.v. kept blacking out and needed to be switched out. The blender did not work. The clothes washer on the main floor was broken, but was fixed. The pool was closed one evening to be fixed. The gas grill at the pool ran out of gas. Had a hard time keeping internet access. This place lookes like a small hotel/motel with could use some updating on the outside. Howeve the rooms on the inside were pleasant, but nothing special. At times people at the service desk were helpful but could be a little more friendly. Seldom asked if we needed anything nor asked how our visit was going. I really liked the location. The beach was just a few steps away. The pool was relaxing. Our family really enjoyed our stay here and we enjoyed doing nothing but relaxing and a little site seeing and shoping. I would not hesitate to come back here again, but in all honesty, since I've paid for a timeshare membership I'd rather have something of higher quality.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect trip to see family after the holidays”
Reviews.Author: lkhummingbird
Reviews.Content: When I called to make the reservation I did have the unpleasent experience of speaking with the rudest person, Nikki was her name, not only did she mess up our charges but she had a bad attitude when I called her back about it. Anyway we were so excited to get there and OMG when we checked in this Nikki was talking on her cell phone and acted like we were bothering her! I vowed not to have anything more to do with her and we sure didn't! We got great directions and ideas of fun things to do even though it wasn't the best weather in January from the lady, Mary who works the desk at night, she always made us laugh and feel right at home! Everybody else was so helpful and nice to be around that I can't wait to go back--but I will always call at night when that nice Mary is working the front desk! She treated us just like family, she even e-mail me pictures of her cats, so sweet! We will be back in warmer weather next time--loved the view and the sunrise. Thanks to "Mary Sunshine" we had a great time! J & M Brown & family

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place To Stay”
Reviews.Author: rsaun00
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Sea Shells Resort 9/20/08-9/27/08. We enjoyed our stay very much. We upgraded to a 2 bedroom 2 bath unit since the one bedroom seemed not to have enough privacy for 2 couples. It only cost $150.00 to upgrade for the week. Kitchen area was a bit cramped but condo was well appointed enough for the four of us to enjoy. No washer/dryer in condo but they have facilities at resort. Small pool but fine. Beach is right behind pool and a beautiful beach it is. Easy to walk on and great for kids. Publix market nearby and plenty of restaurants. We went to the Space center at Cape Kennedy (A must do!!), Golf Village and easy drive up the coast to St. Augustine, and spent a day at Disney (went Epcot and Disneyworld on a Parkhopper ticket) Great day and about an hour away and of course checked out the Speedway (about 10 minutes away) Had a good time there. I would give it a thumb's up.

Reviews.Title: “terrible experience”
Reviews.Author: civonabas
Reviews.Content: The room was not clean, they didn’t provide enough towels. Half the time nobody was in the front office. There was loud music on the speakers in the front of our room until three in the morning. Terrible experience during our stay.

Reviews.Title: “4 Canadians & the Daytona 500”
Reviews.Author: YaYouDo
Reviews.Content: We where there for the Daytona 500 as another hotel messed up our reservation with weeks to find a place. The Sea Shells was able to accommodate our request. This is a smaller hotel then others on the strip but stayed in a double queen room with kitchenette. The room had everything you need (dishes/cutlery for four), had laundry facilities, looked recently renovated (or very clean) with a "coral" theme/colours. There was no high-speed internet connection (have a PC in the hotel lobby). Besides the colour (not a big deal to me) we still had a small view of the ocean, pool was almost opened but looked to be in good repair. The staff is very friendly and you are a short walk to some night clubs & restaurants. Great place to go to for the race (less traffic coming from the ocean side of the track) or even to bring the kids for a week of playing in the sand. Reasonably priced and I would go back again. Boris...

Reviews.Title: “Great Facility& Location”
Reviews.Author: TorontoTrillium
Reviews.Content: I just finished a week at this resort and loved every minute of it! In fact, I am already planning to return next year with my elderly parents. This trip, my spouse and I rented a one-bedroom/one bathroom suite that was very spacious and very well stocked with all the dishes and appliances that one would need in life. Sea Shells Resort is conveniently located. For example, take a 15 minute stroll south down the beach to reach Daytona’s main pier and shopping centre where you will find, among other things, a Starbuck’s coffee shop, several restaurants, gift shops, and more. Just a short drive north of Sea Shells and you will find a grocery store, liquor store and many restaurants. This location was also a great place from which to access many state and federal parks that provided excellent hiking, bird/dolphin/turtle watching, and other natural wonders. Although the resort’s pool and beach access were closed for restoration, the resort had made arrangements for us to use the facilities right next door which was wonderful. To sum up the experience, this facility is very clean and is family-oriented. Great place to stay! You can view photos of this resort at http://www.seashellsbeachclub.com/index.html.

Reviews.Title: “very accommodating staff”
Reviews.Author: phy
Reviews.Content: We were in town for a wedding, where my husband was to be the best man. I asked about check-in time and was told 4pm. I asked about an earlier check-in time due to the fact that the wedding was scheduled for 5pm at a nearby hotel. Everyone I spoke with was most accommodating and they agreed to let us check in a few hours earlier. This was most beneficial for us. The room did not afford any view of the ocean, but we knew this in advance and decided to opt for the bargain rate since we would only be in the room to sleep late that evening. The room was very clean and the bed was comfortable. The pillows were hard and not comfortable, but that was our only complaint. We would definitely stay here again.

HotelInfo.Name: Sea Shells Beach Club
HotelInfo.Address: 1014 N. Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
